name: Snake Escape (Funny House Games)
description:
A classic Nokia's snake games with challenging puzzle mode.

==============

Game Features:
+ CLASSIC MODE! Make your snake survive and get your high score.
+ ESCAPE MODE! Get the key and escape from the room.
+ UNLOCK ALL LEVELS! unlock all levels by passing each level.
+ SET SPEED! Set your snake speed. it's between 1-9.
+ SET YOUR SNAKE! Choose your snake. there are 9 kind of snakes available.
+ PLAY MORE GAME! Get more interesting game in our official website!

Feel free to try the game

You can purchase this game and host it on your own website.
